Worth reading as flooding is becoming more of an issue these days in our current climate. https://t.co/MrYxWHvHTA

text:
RT @EnvAgency: Floods can destroy your most treasured possessions.

Taking a few simple steps now can help protect your home and family.

D‚Ä¶

RT @EnvAgencySE: If you live in a flood risk area you should be prepared for #flooding.
This #FloodActionWeek we want to make you aware tha‚Ä¶

RT @EnvAgencySE: If you live in a flood risk area you should be prepared for #flooding.
This #FloodActionWeek we want to make you aware tha‚Ä¶
RT @EnvAgencyYNE: Read all about Gordon Stewart, a volunteer for #Prudhoe flood warden group in #Northumberland who is also a county counci‚Ä¶

RT @itvweather: Why don't you sign up for flood warnings from the @EnvAgency - it's a free service and could save your life!

More informat‚Ä¶

RT @EnvAgencyMids: Project update!

We have now installed rock rolls and coir rolls along the edge of the dyke channel to help protect the‚Ä¶

RT @EnvAgency: Do you know what to do in a flood?

Make sure you know the simple steps to take if a Flood Alert, Flood Warning, or Severe F‚Ä¶
Join @BSI_UK on 25 November to learn more about flood resilience standards and from @EnvAgency on work to renew the #PFR framework by summer 2021 https://t.co/J6C9cksQN3

urls.title: What to do in a flood - GOV.UK
urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, river and sea levels, check the 5-day forecast or use flood risk maps

text: @WaterUK @NaturalEngland @Natures_Voice @WoodlandTrust @WildlifeTrusts @YorkshireWater @AnglianWater @EnvAgency @NorthumbrianH2O Allowing regular,routine discharges of sewage into our rivers contributes significantly to climate change and global warming. What are your plans for bringing sewage discharges in line with the Urban Wasterwater Treatment Directive so they only happen under exceptional rainfall?
